creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly acquired by the Center with the kind assistance of Carol Brooks and Prof. James Cahill in honor of George Schlenker
description: rugged mountain landscape with steep, winding path; human figure climbing path at UL; group of figures on horses at LL ascending path; two figures crossing an arched bridge at LR
marks:
Signature, Inscription, Marks, and Seals

URC, i URC
medium: Ink and light color on silk
title: Road to Shu
